record.creatorPhotographer: Mead, Mildred; Chicago Land Clearance Commission
record.description: A view of relocated Lake Park Avenue looking north in the Chicago Land Clearance Commission's Project Hyde Park A. The project, which encompasses forty-two acres, is centered at Lake Park Avenue and 55th Street. For this project and that of Hyde Park B, the redeveloper Webb and Knapp is building approximately 800 dwellings.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Stamp: Please return to Chicago Land Clearance Commission. Photographer's stamp. Partial stamp in corner of image.
